info.name: MAL - Dark Theme
info.description:
READ PLEASE!!
I made this for personal use.
many of these scripts are borrowed from others

Install these scripts to make it better:
https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/13183-myanimelist-mal-move-favorites
https://greasyfork.org/sv/scripts/13129-myanimelist-mal-profile-switch-3
https://greasyfork.org/sv/scripts/9245-mal-profile-clickable
https://greasyfork.org/sv/scripts/10364-realign-myanimelist-airing-not-yet-aired-publishing
https://greasyfork.org/scripts/16777-myanimelist-mal-direct-anime-manga-lists/code/MyAnimeList(MAL)%20-%20Direct%20AnimeManga%20Lists.user.js

Additional:
https://greasyfork.org/sv/scripts/9328-mal-hide-non-japanese-voice-actors
https://greasyfork.org/sv/scripts/5709-bbcodes-for-mal
https://greasyfork.org/sv/scripts/7905-myanimelist-mal-series-highlighter
info.additionalInfo:
01/09-2016, made #contentWrapper wider, from 1060px to 1100px, fixed some extra stuff
24/08-2016, changed to https

Credits to Metricx, redubs, Zeando

I know that there is still bugs, I'll fix it...someday.
_________________________________________________________

Other beautiful themes made by creative people:
https://userstyles.org/styles/83319/myanimelist-modernized (Metricx)
https://userstyles.org/styles/120181/myanimelist-lucid-theme (RedUbs)
https://userstyles.org/styles/86145/crayon-for-mal (pajamapop)
https://userstyles.org/styles/87457/crayon-plus (pajamapop)
